callee: SELECT 1 AS one FROM "follows" WHERE "follows"."account_id" = $1 AND "follows"."target_account_id" = $2 LIMIT $3
SELECT 1 AS one FROM "mutes" WHERE "mutes"."account_id" = $1 AND "mutes"."target_account_id" = $2 AND "mutes"."hide_notifications" = $3 LIMIT $4
SELECT 1 AS one FROM "mutes" WHERE "mutes"."account_id" = $1 AND "mutes"."target_account_id" = $2 LIMIT $3
